api_list.name: Get All news
api_list.description: Get All titles news from all magazines
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://testscraper2022.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "testscraper2022.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get single news
api_list.description: Get singles titles from one only magazine
api_list.code:

url = "https://testscraper2022.p.rapidapi.com/news/The Guardian"

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://testscraper2022.p.rapidapi.com/news/{nameofthemagazine}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "testscraper2022.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
